Package groupproject

Class OrderList

java.lang.Object
groupproject.OrderList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Indexable
public class OrderList extends Object implements Indexable
Implements methods to keep track of orders, tables, products,reservations and staff Implements methods to allow creation, search, update and deletion of orders. Reads stored orders from text file upon instantiation, writes to text file every time orders are created or deleted.
Author:
Samantha Tan

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderList

      public OrderList​(Menu menu, TableManager tables)
      Class contructor, instantiates ArrayList of Orders, reads stored orders from text file
      Parameters:
      menu - menu object containing all the items available to order
      tables - TableManager object that keep tracks of the available tables

  • Method Details

    • writeOrder

      public void writeOrder()
      writeOrder method to write the order details to the text file

    • createOrder

      public void createOrder​(Order order, int tableID)
      Create order method for creating a new order, displaying it and occupying the respective table when called. The order will be added to active orders
      Parameters:
      order - the order object to be created
      tableID - the tableID that the order is taking place at

    • update

      public void update​(Order order, int index)
      update order method for when order details need to be modified for a particular order
      Parameters:
      order - the updated order that will be used to replace the old order
      index - the index of the order that needs to be modified

      Returns:

    • checkActiveOrders

      public boolean checkActiveOrders()
      method to check if there are any active orders at the moment
      Returns:
      true if there are no active orders, and false if there is at least one active order
